description: This image presents an absurd scenario where a large, amorphous figure is submerged in the water but fishing from within the boat, blurring the lines between the angler and the environment being fished. The figures on the boat react with urgency, seemingly instructing the submerged fisherman, which creates dark irony as the 'catch' appears to be the fisherman himself. The situation subverts expectations of a typical fishing trip, highlighting a surreal reversal of roles and locations.
caption: "Set the hook! Set the hook!"
